languages.text: "Прошу простить, что потревожил вас, Вольный Торговец. Думаю, мне лучше уйти". {n}Глухой голос Соломона полон тоски и стыда.{/n}
"I apologise for disturbing you, Rogue Trader. I think I'd better go." {n}Solomorne's low voice is full of anguish and shame.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Прошу простить, что потревожил вас, Вольный Торговец. Думаю, мне лучше уйти". {n}Глухой голос Соломона полон тоски и стыда.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I apologise for disturbing you, Rogue Trader. I think I'd better go." {n}Solomorne's low voice is full of anguish and shame.{/n}

"I apologise for disturbing you, Rogue Trader. I think I'd better go." {n}Solomorne's low voice is full of anguish and shame.{/n}

languages.text: « Je m'excuse de vous avoir {mf|réveillé|réveillée}, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je ferais mieux de vous laisser, » {n}déclare Solomorne à mi-voix, sur un ton empreint de douleur et de honte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I apologise for disturbing you, Rogue Trader. I think I'd better go." {n}Solomorne's low voice is full of anguish and shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je m'excuse de vous avoir {mf|réveillé|réveillée}, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je ferais mieux de vous laisser, » {n}déclare Solomorne à mi-voix, sur un ton empreint de douleur et de honte.{/n}

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダー。起こしてしまい、すみませんでした。もう失礼した方がいいようです」{n}ソロモーンの低い声には、苦悩と羞恥の色がにじんでいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I apologise for disturbing you, Rogue Trader. I think I'd better go." {n}Solomorne's low voice is full of anguish and shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー。起こしてしまい、すみませんでした。もう失礼した方がいいようです」{n}ソロモーンの低い声には、苦悩と羞恥の色がにじんでいた。{/n}

languages.text: «Perdone las molestias, Comerciante Independiente. Será mejor que me vaya». {n}La grave voz de Solomorne rezuma angustia y vergüenza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I apologise for disturbing you, Rogue Trader. I think I'd better go." {n}Solomorne's low voice is full of anguish and shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Perdone las molestias, Comerciante Independiente. Será mejor que me vaya». {n}La grave voz de Solomorne rezuma angustia y vergüenza.{/n}

languages.text: “很抱歉打扰了你，行商浪人。我看，我最好还是走吧。”{n}索罗蒙低声开了口， 声音中充满了痛苦和羞愧。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I apologise for disturbing you, Rogue Trader. I think I'd better go." {n}Solomorne's low voice is full of anguish and shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “很抱歉打扰了你，行商浪人。我看，我最好还是走吧。”{n}索罗蒙低声开了口， 声音中充满了痛苦和羞愧。{/n}

languages.text: "Rahatsız ettiğim için özür dilerim Hür Tacir. En iyisi gideyim." {n}Solomorne'un kısık sesi, acı ve utançla dolu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I apologise for disturbing you, Rogue Trader. I think I'd better go." {n}Solomorne's low voice is full of anguish and shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Rahatsız ettiğim için özür dilerim Hür Tacir. En iyisi gideyim." {n}Solomorne'un kısık sesi acı ve utançla dolu.{/n}

languages.text: "Bitte entschuldigt die Störung, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich gehe jetzt besser." {n}Solomornes tiefe Stimme ist voller Leid und Scham.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I apologise for disturbing you, Rogue Trader. I think I'd better go." {n}Solomorne's low voice is full of anguish and shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bitte entschuldigt die Störung, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich gehe jetzt besser." {n}Solomornes tiefe Stimme ist voller Leid und Scham.{/n}
